Brifly is a short news app that selects the most recent and important news from multiple trusted news portals and summarises it in 70 words or less in multiple regional languages, including English and Hindi to ensure you stay up to date with what's going on in the world during your busy day. Rather than simply trying to be the first to report something, we share news in a concise manner that is accurate, adheres to journalistic ethics, and has been verified by multiple sources.

Brifly began with a simple idea: "News can be so much more simplified and even easier to consume."

You can read interesting news from a variety of categories and feeds in multiple languages. Download the app to stay up to date on the latest breaking news in 70 words or less from around the world, right at your fingertips, from:
Entertainment

Politics
Business
National
World News
Brifly Exclusive
COVID-19
Tech/Science
Startups
Bizzare
Crime
Art & Culture
Legal

How is Brifly different than any other news organization?

We concluded that the most efficient way to consume news is through a CRISP, BRIEF, and SWIFT manner after conducting extensive research on how the average person consumes news. This way, the consumer not only saves time, but also has the assurance that the information is correct and verified.

Here's how we distinguish ourselves:
Brifly News is the brainchild of a diverse group of media professionals who want to change the way news is delivered and consumed.
At Brifly, we encourage our reporters to present facts rather than opinions, with an emphasis on fact-checking and verification.
Our distinct news delivery format: keeping it brief, accurate, and easy to read.
We focus on delivering verified news that is consistent and credible using a hybrid approach (traditional + new media) to content presentation.
We set out to deliver news in an "easy-to-consume" format by leveraging the potential of social media, particularly among the younger demographic.
Brifly's news is packaged as an Instagram visual or post, with short captions and a voice-over that elaborates on the news presented.

The following are the fundamental principles upon which Brifly was founded:
Verified News: We verify news from a variety of sources.
No Opinion: Concentrate on Facts, Not Opinions
No Biased News: we deliver news Not views
Brief: We provide 5Ws and 1H 
Crisp: We publish News in less than 70 words
Regional News in Several Languages
